Room.Name: Shuddering Room
Room.ShortDescription: This room vibrates and shudders, as if the walls themselves are in pain.
Room.LongDescription: Something tells you that the force of life, which binds all living things together, has been horribly twisted and mutilated here by some unthinkable magic. There is another room to the west, from which you can see a fireworks-like abundance of light, and hear constant booming and screaming noises. To the south, a passage leads back into the more normal regions of the underground city.
